dcterms:creator: Pascal Klink
Carlo D’Eramo
Jan R Peters
Joni Pajarinen
dcterms:description: A contextual PM-S environment where an agent navigates a point mass through a gate of a given size towards a goal in a two-dimensional space. The agent operates within a goal-based reward setting where the reward is binary and sparse.
dcterms:title: Point Mass Sparse (PM-S)

dcterms:creator: Pascal Klink
Haoyi Yang
Carlo D’Eramo
Jan Peters
Joni Pajarinen
dcterms:description: A sparse-reward, goal-reaching environment where an agent needs to reach a desired position with high precision. The target distribution is a uniform distribution restricted to a specific 2D region with minimal tolerance.
dcterms:title: Sparse Goal Reaching (SGR)

dcterms:creator: Maxime Chevalier-Boisvert
et al.
dcterms:description: A modular and customizable reinforcement learning environment for goal-oriented tasks, featuring various missions that require distinct skills such as navigation and object manipulation.
dcterms:title: MiniGrid (MINIG)

dcterms:creator: Clément Romac
Rémy Portelas
Katja Hofmann
Pierre-Yves Oudeyer
dcterms:description: A benchmark for automatic curriculum learning in deep reinforcement learning, where a bipedal agent is tasked with walking in an environment with varying stump heights and spacings.
dcterms:title: Bipedal Walker Stump Tracks (BW)
